name: Bombay Sweets Biryani Masala
description:
Ingredients: Coriander, Cumin, Cinnamon, Cloves, Bay Leaves, Black, Pepper, Cardamom, Turmeric, Dry Ginger, Salt, Other Spices and Seasonings. Bombay Sweets Biryani Masala is a specially crafted spice blend designed to bring authentic flavor to your biryani dishes. This aromatic mix of spices includes coriander, cumin, cardamom, and other essential ingredients that enhance the rich and savory taste of biryani. The 40 gm pack is perfect for preparing biryani for family meals or special occasions. Usage: To use, add the biryani masala while cooking your rice and meat or vegetables. It can be mixed with yogurt to marinate meat or added directly to the pot while cooking for a flavorful, aromatic biryani. Adjust quantity based on taste preferences.

name: Fresh Biryani Masala
description:
Fresh Biryani Masala, in a 40 gm pack, is a perfectly blended mix of spices for making authentic biryani. This aromatic spice blend adds a rich and flavorful taste to your rice dishes, enhancing the taste of chicken, lamb, or vegetable biryani. Convenient and ready-to-use.

name: Aftab Haleem Mix
description:
Aftab Haleem Mix is a ready-made blend of lentils, wheat, barley, and carefully selected spices to simplify the preparation of haleem, a popular slow-cooked, hearty dish in South Asian and Middle Eastern cuisines. It delivers authentic flavor and texture with ease.Ingredients: Lentils (Masoor Dal, Moong Dal, Chana Dal, etc.), Wheat, Barley, Rice, Oats (optional in some mixes), Spice Mix (turmeric, coriander, cumin, cinnamon, cloves, cardamom, black pepper, etc.)Note: Ingredient composition may vary slightly based on the manufacturer.Making Process:Preparation: Soak the mix (if required) to soften the grains.Cooking: Add the haleem mix to a slow cooker or pressure cooker with meat (chicken, mutton, or beef) or a vegetarian alternative.Seasoning: Add water, spices, and ghee/oil for added richness. Cook until the mixture thickens into a creamy consistency.Garnish: Top with fried onions, fresh coriander, lemon wedges, and ginger for added flavor.Uses: Ideal for preparing haleem for family meals, parties, or festivals.Can be served as a main dish or alongside naan, parathas, or rice.A wholesome, filling option for special occasions like Ramadan or Eid.
Aftab Haleem Mix is a ready-made blend of lentils, wheat, barley, and carefully selected spices to simplify the preparation of haleem, a popular slow-cooked, hearty dish in South Asian and Middle Eastern cuisines. It delivers authentic flavor and texture with ease.
Ingredients: Lentils (Masoor Dal, Moong Dal, Chana Dal, etc.), Wheat, Barley, Rice, Oats (optional in some mixes), Spice Mix (turmeric, coriander, cumin, cinnamon, cloves, cardamom, black pepper, etc.)
Note: Ingredient composition may vary slightly based on the manufacturer.
Making Process:
Preparation: Soak the mix (if required) to soften the grains.
Cooking: Add the haleem mix to a slow cooker or pressure cooker with meat (chicken, mutton, or beef) or a vegetarian alternative.
Seasoning: Add water, spices, and ghee/oil for added richness. Cook until the mixture thickens into a creamy consistency.
Garnish: Top with fried onions, fresh coriander, lemon wedges, and ginger for added flavor.
Uses: Ideal for preparing haleem for family meals, parties, or festivals.
Can be served as a main dish or alongside naan, parathas, or rice.
A wholesome, filling option for special occasions like Ramadan or Eid.

name: Fresh Firni Mix
description:

name: Shan Chicken Tikka Masala Mix
description:
Shan Chicken Tikka Masala Mix is a delicious and aromatic spice mix that is perfect for adding flavor to your chicken dishes. This masala mix is made from a harmonized blend of spices that deliver a savory, tangy taste that can accompany all sorts of dishes exceptionally well.

name: Shan Malay Spice Mix for Memoni Mutton Biryani
description:
Shan Malay Spice Mix for Memoni Mutton Biryani is a delightful blend of rich and aromatic spices that brings the true essence of Biryani to your kitchen.  this spice mix imparts the perfect flavor to mutton in your Biryani. It captures the essence of traditional Memoni cuisine.

name: Shan Tikka Bbq
description:
Shan Tikka BBQ  halal. May contain: traces of Sulphite, Sesame, Mustard, Gluten and Tree Nuts,  Suitable for Vegetarian, No artificial colours, No artificial preservatives.  Ingredients: Salt, Red Chilli, Papain, Turmeric, Fennel, Cinnamon, Cumin, Brown Cardamom, Black Pepper, Mace, Nutmeg, Star Aniseed, Ginger, Garlic, Citric Acid (E330), Artificial Food Clolours FD & C Yellow 5& 6/ E102 & E110.

name: Shan Sindhi Biryani Mix
description:
Shan Sindhi Biryani Mix helps you prepare traditional Biryani at home with an authentic taste and aroma for an ultimate food experience. ingredients Himalayan Pink Salt Garlic Ginger Cumin Bay Leaf Brown Cardamom Cinnamon Carom Green Cardamom Clove Red.

name: Shan Korma Curry Mix
description:
Shan Korma Curry Mix is a delicious and aromatic spice mix that is perfect for adding flavor to your korma dishes. This masala mix is made from a harmonized blend of spices that deliver a savory, tangy taste that can accompany all sorts of dishes exceptionally well.

name: Shan Spice Mix For Malay Chicken Biryani
description:
Shan Spice Mix For Malay Chicken Biryani is a product of Pakistan. Shan Spice Mix For Malay Chicken Biryani made from  Paprika, Himalayan Pink Salt, Red Chilli, Nigella Seed, Star Aniseed, Cumin, Cinnamon, Black Pepper, Brown Cardamom, Clove, Turmeric, Garlic, Maltodextrin, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Citric Acid, Cane Sugar, Canola Oil, Natural And Artificial Food Flavour, Silicon Dioxide (anti-caking agent). Shan Spice Mix For Malay Chicken Biryani has no artificial preservative, no artificial color, and is halal.

name: Farmer's Gold Khichuri Mix
description:
Farmer’s Gold Khichuri Mix it’s a sample way to make delicious Khichuri. It’s best choice for you & your family. It has all required ingredients of Chinigura Rice, Mixed Dal, Spice Powder & Salt. It makes you the best taste of Khichuri.
